iep_goals: Improve reading comprehension by identifying main ideas and supporting details with 80% accuracy in 3 out of 4 trials
Complete multi-step math problems involving fractions with 75% accuracy in 3 out of 4 trials
accommodations: Extended time on tests (1.5x standard time)
Access to graphic organizers for writing assignments
learning_styles: benefits from visual aids and examples
placement: 80% time in regular class, 20% time in resource room

interviews.parent: Parent reported Sophia enjoys art and hands-on activities. She struggles with reading fluency and becomes frustrated when reading aloud.
interviews.teacher: Sophia participates actively in class discussions but needs additional support to decode complex texts.

observations.psychologist: Testing indicates average cognitive ability with significant discrepancies in reading skills. Benefits from structured literacy instruction.
